adjective.description: (of a person or part of their body) very thin.
(of coffee) made with skimmed or semi-skimmed milk.
examples: one skinny latte to go, please

noun.description: A pair of skinny pants, especially jeans.
examples: if you're tired of squeezing into your skinnies, bell-bottoms and flares are back in fashion

noun.description: Confidential information on a particular person or topic.
examples: the inside skinny is that he didn't know the deal was in the works
